QuestData.Title: Two-Faced Pirate Scum
QuestData.Description:
We've been holding the Irontide off for days, but now they've brought in an ettin for reinforcements. We can't let him attack the town.
A few of my best men just went up the hill to try and kill him. You look pretty capable, they could sure use your help?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: An Irontide pirate with a long history of violence.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hurry $p you've got to kill the ettin.
QuestData.RewardText: You've got skills we could use. You want join us and find the treasure before the Irontide?
